description.plain:
Jake Lawson, better known as JVKE, is a singer, songwriter and GRAMMY-nominated producer from Cranston, Rhode Island. He began his career on TikTok in 2020 creating videos that often featured his mom making beats that he created. In just a few months, JVKE gained a large following after going viral for his “TikTok Mashup,” that later became his first single, “Upside Down.”

JVKE has exceed over 10 million followers on TikTok and has been able to work with artists such as Charlie Puth, Daya, and Galantis.

In September 2022, JVKE released his debut album, this is what ____ feels like containing his viral hit singles, “this is what falling in love feels like” and “golden hour.”

body.plain:
Jake Lawson, better known as JVKE, is a singer, songwriter and GRAMMY-nominated producer from Cranston, Rhode Island. He began his career on TikTok in 2020 creating videos that often featured his mom making beats that he created. In just a few months, JVKE gained a large following after going viral for his “TikTok Mashup,” that later became his first single, “Upside Down.”

JVKE has exceed over 10 million followers on TikTok and has been able to work with artists such as Charlie Puth, Daya, and Galantis.

In September 2022, JVKE released his debut album, this is what ____ feels like containing his viral hit singles, “this is what falling in love feels like” and “golden hour.”

songs.full_title: ​golden hour by JVKE
songs.title: ​golden hour

description.plain:
“golden hour” is the third song released off of JVKE’s debut album, this is what ____ feels like.

Prior to announcing the song, JVKE shared on his Instagram story on July 12, 2022:

This song has a special place in my heart and I can’t wait to share it with you all. I did my absolute best to embody beauty in every detail of the production.

In late August 2022, “golden hour” became the most viral song in the world on Spotify Viral 50 USA and Global chart following a video of himself playing the song on the piano for his childhood piano teacher went viral on numerous social platforms.

songs.lyrics:
54 ContributorsTranslationsFrançaisEspañolPortuguês日本語​golden hour Lyrics[Verse 1]
It was just two lovers
Sittin' in the car, listening to Blonde, fallin' for each other
Pink and orange skies, feelin' super childish, no Donald Glover
Missed call from my mother
Like, "Where you at tonight?"
Got no alibi

[Pre-Chorus]
I was all alone with the love of my life
She's got glitter for skin
My radiant beam in the night
I don't need no light to see you

[Chorus]
Shine
It's your golden hour (Oh-oh-oh)
You slow down time
In your golden hour (Oh-oh-oh)

[Verse 2]
We were just two lovers
Feet up on the dash, drivin' nowhere fast, burnin' through the summer
Radio on blast, make the moment last, she got solar power
Minutes feel like hours
She knew she was the baddest
Can you even imagine fallin' like I did?
You might also like[Pre-Chorus]
For the love of my life
She's got glow on her face
A glorious look in her eyes
My angel of light
I was all alone with the love of my life
She's got glitter for skin
My radiant beam in the night
I don't need no light to see you

[Chorus]
Shine
It's your golden hour (Oh-oh-oh)
You slow down time
In your golden hour (Oh-oh-oh)
[Instrumental Outro]14Embed

songs.full_title: ​this is what falling in love feels like by JVKE
songs.title: ​this is what falling in love feels like
songs.title_with_featured: ​this is what falling in love feels like

description.plain:
“this is what falling in love feels like” is a song by JVKE, released on September 3, 2021, as the lead single from his debut album, this is what ____ feels like. The song starts the “falling in love” section of the album.

“this is what falling in love feels like” was first shared on JVKE’s Twitch channel when creating the song on his livestream.
A few days after starting the song on stream JVKE shared the audio on his TikTok receiving over 2 million views on both the original snippet and 4D audio. On August 18, 2021, JVKE finished the song on his Twitch stream.

Since the release, JVKE has received over 20 million views on his TikTok using the song featuring him and his mom. “this is what falling in love feels like” was also included in a Samsung commercial for their Galaxy Z Flip3 Bespoke Edition.

“this is what falling in love feels like” was first shared on JVKE’s Twitch channel when creating the song on his livestream.
A few days after starting the song on stream JVKE shared the audio on his TikTok receiving over 2 million views on both the original snippet and 4D audio. On August 18, 2021, JVKE finished the song on his Twitch stream.

songs.full_title: ​this is what heartbreak feels like by JVKE
songs.title: ​this is what heartbreak feels like

description.plain:
Sharing the feeling of heartbreak with a breakup song about a partner telling lies and cheating, JVKE continues to embody emotions through his music with “this is what heartbreak feels like” following the success of “this is what falling in love feels like”. “this is what heartbreak feels like” opens the second chapter of JVKE’s album, this is what ____ feels like, which expands on the concept of heartbreak.

JVKE started making “this is what heartbreak feels like” on his Twitch channel in late 2021. He first shared the song on his TikTok on February 11, 2022, claiming it to be his most emotional song he’s ever composed.

On March 31, 2022, JVKE stated on his Instagram story,

This song dropping tonight came from a deep place. I hope you all feel it.
